TextView.android:text: Analyze the ESMS Alarm panel Messages, Events Log & take corrective action

1) E-State (Equipment) Colors: Green-Normal; White –Switch Off; Yellow-Minor Fault; Orange-Major Fault; Red- Critical Fault; Blue-Initial State. 2) C-State (Control & Monitoring State) Colors: Black- Normal acquisition; Blue- Unknown Status; Red- User Set Status
Power LED-Green & Other connected Links blinking
